name: @marhc/sayhello
description: Another very simple Hello World example, with submodules.

scripts.transpile: rimraf './dev/**/*' && npx cross-env BABEL_ENV=transpile npx babel src --out-dir dev
scripts.minify: rimraf './dist/**/*' && npx cross-env BABEL_ENV=minify npx babel dev --out-dir dist
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run minify

author: Marcio Coutinho
